content: Ok so i am 17 years old. im a junior in high school and im joining the marines. already enlisted in the DEP. i have a question though because the day i told my parents i was joining they kicked me out of the house and told me to never come back. so i left but then they called the police and the police took me to the hospital. at the hospital they thought i was depresses because i was joining the marines but i told them ive always wanted to do it. my parents then wanted me to go on anti-depressants. so i took them for 5 days so i could get out of the hospital and return home. once i got home i stopped taking them and my parents agreed i wasnt depresses and accepted that i was goin to be a marine and signed the DEP papers. Now we see a family therapist once a month so to talk about me joining the marines but i want to stop seeing the doctor because i know i cant join if i dont. will taking the meds for 5 days DQ me from joining even though my parents agree it was their fault, and that im not depresed. and my doctor said im not depressed and that he will give me a note saying what happened wasnt my fault but my parents overrracted. will this keep me from joining the corps? also when i was 15 i took my parents car out and got pulled over but nothing major happened, but my friend did the same thing and he got it waivered very easily im more concerned with the meds tho so what do u guys think?

Now we see a family therapist once a month so to talk about me joining the marines but i want to stop seeing the doctor because i know i cant join if i dont. will taking the meds for 5 days DQ me from joining even though my parents agree it was their fault, and that im not depresed. and my doctor said im not depressed and that he will give me a note saying what happened wasnt my fault but my parents overrracted. will this keep me from joining the corps? also when i was 15 i took my parents car out and got pulled over but nothing major happened, but my friend did the same thing and he got it waivered very easily im more concerned with the meds tho so what do u guys think?
title: joining the marines
